How to Describe Your Horrifyingly Terrible Dumpster Fire Job in an Interview

stories.text:
I’m in-line to receive my green card in 2 years. At that time I’d like to try my hand at a startup. I’ve been saving money to fund myself for the first year (or two, or …?) but there are lots of unknowns financially once you start to get traction. How long until a founder can typically draw a salary? How much is typically drawn?

I suspect the answer is ‘keep your burn as low as possible’ but advice is appreciated. Some details about my situation: - married with baby - live in non-BA big tech center - interested in buying house but concerned about locking in my burn rate - currently working at a well paying large CO as a SWE
stories.title: Ask HN: How should aspiring founders plan financially?
Show HN: Remap keys on windows without installing anything

stories.text: I've never really been a user of smartwatches or fitness bands (I stick to my trusty Casio F91-W), but recently I've wanted a way to view Google Calendar notifications on my wrist. Is there an inexpensive device that can pair with an Android to do this, preferably one that respects privacy?
stories.title: Ask HN: Device to show calendar events on my wrist?
Why is a Dollar like a Neanderthal
